CanvasApp.Name: msdyn_inventorymobile_b5ede
CanvasApp.Description: The Inventory On-hand Mobile Application provides an instant view of the on-hand status across facilities. It lets customer view on-hand inventory across facilities, current material reservations, and unreserved on-hand inventory. Customer can also enter item numbers to query on-hand inventory, and can do a filtered search for on-hand products or variants.
